text:
TUT.BY is a web portal from Minsk, Belarus, in Russian and Belarusian languages. It works since 2000. It is a very big website in the country. The international organization Reporters Without Borders saw it as a cruel attack on the web portal. The USA together with more than fifty other countries and the EU requested the Belarusian authorities to stop such attacks.
A man of business Yuri Zisser (1960–2020) made the website in October 2000. The website worked with online media rights since January 2019.
